been playing this off and on for a good amount

Although I have tons and leagues of critcisms for Valve themselves on failing to make another CS successor and still think that valve themselves are completely lacking in games themselves due to their overall "mighty narcisssitic" sense of their own mind due to Steam itself

CSGO was a worthy predecessor to CS:S even though I do prefer CS:S I think CSGO stands well enough due to it having my favorite battle royale mode of all games so far as of mid 2020 and due to the competitive matchmaking which is still leagues better than valorant

I do recommend this but I do also say that Valve has been waiting too long for a successor for the next CS and it is a shame they havent made anything recently except "Boneworks but bad" the VR game
